[File: third_party/move/move-ir-compiler/src/lib.rs] [Function: compile_mod()] [Compilation Bomb] Can a small IR input expand into an exponentially large CompiledModule due to code duplication or monomorphization, exhausting memory and CPU resources? (High)

[File: third_party/move/move-ir-compiler/src/lib.rs] [Function: compile_script()] [Generic Type Exploitation] Can an attacker use IR with malformed generic type parameters to generate bytecode that bypasses the Move type verifier, allowing unsafe type casts? (Critical)

[File: third_party/move/move-ir-compiler/src/lib.rs] [Function: compile_mod()] [Ability Forgery] Can malicious IR declare structs with forged abilities (e.g., claiming copy when it contains non-copyable fields), bypassing Move's resource safety guarantees? (Critical)

[File: third_party/move/move-ir-compiler/src/lib.rs] [Function: compile_mod()] [Visibility Violation] Can IR compile into bytecode that grants public visibility to functions or structs that should be private, allowing unauthorized access to protected resources? (Critical)

[File: third_party/move/move-ir-compiler/src/lib.rs] [Function: compile_script()] [Reference Safety Bypass] Can crafted IR generate bytecode with invalid reference operations (e.g., creating mutable and immutable references to the same data simultaneously) that corrupt memory? (Critical)

[File: third_party/move/move-ir-compiler/src/lib.rs] [Function: compile_script()] [Integer Overflow in Bytecode] Can malicious IR with large integer literals cause overflow during bytecode constant pool construction, leading to truncated or wrapped values that enable financial exploits? (Critical)

[File: third_party/move/move-ir-compiler/src/lib.rs] [Function: into_script_blob()] [Size Calculation Overflow] When calculating the size of serialized_script Vec<u8>, can integer overflow in size computations cause allocation of insufficient memory and buffer overflow? (Critical)

[File: third_party/move/move-ir-compiler/src/lib.rs] [Function: compile_mod()] [Index Overflow] Can module tables (functions, structs, constants) overflow their index limits, causing bytecode to reference invalid entries and corrupt VM state? (Critical)

[File: third_party/move/move-ir-compiler/src/lib.rs] [Function: compile_script()] [Dependency Version Mismatch] If deps contains modules compiled with different bytecode versions than the current compiler, can this cause type mismatches or ABI incompatibilities leading to runtime crashes? (High)

[File: third_party/move/move-ir-compiler/src/lib.rs] [Function: compile_mod()] [Transitive Dependency Poisoning] If a module in deps itself depends on malicious modules not included in deps, can the compilation fail to detect security violations in the full dependency graph? (High)

[File: third_party/move/move-ir-compiler/src/lib.rs] [Function: compile_mod()] [Struct Layout Mismatch] If a dependency module's struct layout changes but the compiled version in deps is stale, can this cause memory corruption when accessing struct fields? (Critical)

[File: third_party/move/move-ir-compiler/src/lib.rs] [Function: compile_script()] [Import Confusion] Can an attacker craft IR that imports the same function or type from multiple conflicting modules in deps, causing ambiguous resolution and incorrect bytecode generation? (High)

[File: third_party/move/move-ir-compiler/src/lib.rs] [Function: compile_mod()] [Module Hash Collision] Are compiled modules identified by cryptographic hashes, and if so, can an attacker find hash collisions to replace legitimate modules with malicious versions? (Critical)

[File: third_party/move/move-ir-compiler/src/lib.rs] [Function: into_module_blob()] [Bytecode Hash Integrity] Is the serialized module blob integrity-protected, or can bit flips during storage/transmission corrupt bytecode in ways that bypass verification? (High)

[File: third_party/move/move-ir-compiler/src/lib.rs] [Struct: Compiler] [State Mutation] Since Compiler is cloneable, if the underlying deps modules are mutated after cloning, can this cause non-deterministic compilation results across validators? (Critical)
